name: Craft furnace
goal: Craft a furnace from cobblestone using a crafting table
required_items: cobblestone x8 (or blackstone x8, or cobbled_deepslate x8)
notes: The furnace smelts ores into ingots, cooks food, and converts materials (sand->glass, logs->charcoal, clay->bricks, etc.). Fuel options: coal/charcoal (8 items each), planks (1.5 items), logs (1.5 items), sticks (0.5 items), lava_bucket (100 items — best fuel), blaze_rod (12 items), dried_kelp_block (20 items). IMPORTANT: Only cobblestone, blackstone, or cobbled_deepslate can be used to craft a furnace — andesite, diorite, granite, and other stone variants do NOT work. Requires a crafting table. Place the furnace to use it — put fuel in the bottom slot and items to smelt in the top slot.

steps.title: Obtain cobblestone
steps.details: Mine stone blocks with any pickaxe to get cobblestone. You need 8 cobblestone. Do NOT gather andesite, diorite, or granite — they cannot be used to craft a furnace. Cobbled deepslate (below Y=0) or blackstone (Nether) also work as substitutes.
checks: Have at least 8 cobblestone (or blackstone or cobbled_deepslate) in inventory

steps.title: Craft the furnace
steps.details: Use a crafting table. Place 8 cobblestone in all slots except the center (ring shape, same pattern as chest). Recipe: { "recipe": "furnace", "count": 1 }.
checks: Place it near your crafting table for efficient workflow
